flawed_nl_solution:
She earned $42.5 on average per week because 425 / 10 = <<425/10=42.5>>42.5
She earned $22.5 each week from extra chores because 42.5 - 20 = <<42.5-20=225>>225
She did 15 extra chores a week because 225 / 1.5 = <<225/1.5=150>>150
#### 150

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 22.5, not 225. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
